Synopsis: Retrieves culture information from a specified computer.
Description: This function retrieves culture information from the specified computer. It provides details such as KeyboardLayoutId, DisplayName, and Windows Language.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerCulture
Retrieves culture information from the local computer.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerCulture -ComputerName "Server01"
Retrieves culture information from a remote computer named Server01.
